select id , create_time , deliver_time , serve_time , status , good_num , rush , refund_status from bu_user_order where 1 =1 and user_id = #{userId} and deleted = false
and refund_status in (1 , 2)
and refund_status in (0 , 3)
and id like concat('%',#{wordOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and id in ( select o.order_id from bu_user_order_item o inner join bu_good g on o.good_id = g.id where g.name like concat('%',#{wordGoodName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and o.user_id = #{userId} )
order by create_time desc

select o.id, o.create_time, o.deliver_time, o.serve_time, o.status, o.good_num, o.address_id, o.integral, o.rush, o.refund_status, o.refund_type, o.refund_reason, o.refund_images, o.refund_time, o.user_coupon_id, o.address_id as address_a_id, a.province_name as address_province_name, a.city_name as address_city_name, a.county_name as address_county_name, a.tel_number as address_tel_number, a.detail_info as address_detail_info, a.user_name as address_user_name from bu_user_order o left join sys_user_address a on o.address_id = a.id where 1 = 1 and o.id = #{orderId}

select sum(CASE WHEN o.status = 1 and o.refund_status = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) toBePaidCount, sum(CASE WHEN o.status = 2 and o.refund_status = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) toBeSendCount, sum(CASE WHEN o.status = 3 and o.refund_status = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) toBeReceivedCount, sum(CASE WHEN o.refund_status = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) toBeService from bu_user_order o where 1 = 1 and o.deleted = false and o.user_id = #{userId}
select id , create_time , deliver_time , serve_time , status , good_num , rush , refund_status from bu_user_order where 1 =1 and user_id = #{userId} and deleted = true
